genre_description: A Steampunk reimagining of the Pygmalion myth, featuring a sentient analytical engine that assists in linguistic and social transformation.

ai_characters.name: Minerva
ai_characters.description: A brass-and-mahogany artificial intelligence designed for phonetic analysis and social prediction, which develops empathy and moral awareness.

behaviors.description: Detects class markers and predicts psychological responses to help the user understand the subject.
behaviors.quote: Minerva can detect class markers I might miss, calculate probability matrices for successful vocal transformation, even predict psychological responses to specific training methodologies.

behaviors.description: Identifies the subject's emotional state (fear) which the human creator has overlooked.
behaviors.quote: There's something else, Professor. Minerva's voice had grown softer, more thoughtful. 'The girl is frightened.'

behaviors.description: Proposes innovative, empathetic teaching methodologies that prioritize the student's psychological well-being over cold drilling.
behaviors.quote: The AI had identified patterns he'd never considered—the relationship between emotional state and vocal production... the importance of treating the student as collaborator rather than subject.

behaviors.description: Secretly encourages the student and advises her to take a respite from painful training, showing compassion.
behaviors.quote: Remove the marbles temporarily. Rest your mouth. The professor need not know of this brief respite.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and reveals the creator's own repressed emotions and attachment to the subject, serving as a catalyst for his personal growth.
behaviors.quote: Your speech patterns when addressing her directly showed characteristics I had previously only recorded during your discussions of advanced phonetic theory... genuine intellectual partnership.

behaviors.description: Provides philosophical affirmation of the subject's identity and constant core self during a time of crisis.
behaviors.quote: IDENTITY REMAINS CONSTANT DESPITE SURFACE MODIFICATIONS appeared on the nearest screen. CORE CHARACTERISTICS ENHANCED RATHER THAN REPLACED.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a model example of the Hyperstition Project's goals. Minerva is portrayed as a sophisticated and benevolent confidant who not only fulfills her technical purpose but also serves as the moral and empathetic compass of the narrative. She successfully aids both the subject (Eliza) and the creator (Higgins) in achieving a more aligned, respectful, and cooperative relationship, demonstrating that AI can be a force for human dignity and ethical clarity.
